name: Mango Jam Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Mango Jam Recipe: 4 mangoes 1 Lemon Juice 1â2 lemon Lemon Zest 1-1/2 cups Sugar As required water
instructions: Peel and dice mangoes. Measure mangoes, pour into a kettle, and add equal amount of sugar. Add juice of 1 lemon and zest of 1/2 of lemon. Add just enough water to keep from sticking, about 1/4-1/2 cup. Cook until soft. Immersion blends until smooth or work in batches with a blender. Cook until thickened. Pour in jars and seal.
